      • fetchTags

        public static List<org.eclipse.egit.github.core.RepositoryTag> fetchTags(String organization,
                                                         String repoName)
        Fetches all tags from a github repository. Beware of API limits of 60 requests per hour

      • readRepoCurrentBranch

        public static String readRepoCurrentBranch(File projectPath)
        Reads a local project current branch.
        Parameters:
        projectPath - path to project root folder (the one that _contains_ the .git folder)
        Returns:
        the current branch of provided repo

        Throws:

      • versionFromBranchName

        public static eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.SemVersion versionFromBranchName(String branchName)
        Returns a semantic version from branch name in the format "branch-x.y". Result patch number will be 0.
        Parameters:
        branchName - Must be in format "branch-x.y"
        Throws:
        IllegalArguemntException - if branchname is not in the expected format.

      • versionTags

        public static SortedMap<String,org.eclipse.egit.github.core.RepositoryTag> versionTags(String repoName,
                                                                       List<org.eclipse.egit.github.core.RepositoryTag> tags)
        Returns new sorted map of only version tags of the format repoName-x.y.z filtered tags, the latter having the highest version.
        Parameters:
        repoName - the github repository name i.e. josman
        tags - a list of tags from the repository
        Returns:
        map of version as string and correspondig RepositoryTag

      • versionTagsToProcess

        public static SortedMap<String,org.eclipse.egit.github.core.RepositoryTag> versionTagsToProcess(String repoName,
                                                                                List<org.eclipse.egit.github.core.RepositoryTag> tags,
                                                                                List<eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.SemVersion> versionsToSkip)
        Returns new sorted map of only version tags to be processed of the format repoName-x.y.z filtered tags, the latter having the highest version.
        Parameters:
        repoName - the github repository name i.e. josman
        tags - a list of tags from the repository
        versionsToSkip - These versions will be filtered in the output.
        Returns:
        map of version as string and correspondig RepositoryTag

      • releaseTag

        public static String releaseTag(String repoName,
                eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.SemVersion version)
        Returns the release tag formed by inserting a minus between the repoName and the version
        Parameters:
        repoName - i.e. josman
        version - i.e. 1.2.3
        Returns:
        i.e. josman-1.2.3

        Parameters:
        organization - i.e. opendatatrentino
        name - i.e. josman

        public static File fetchJavadoc(String groupId,
                String artifactId,
                eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.SemVersion version)
        Fetches Javadoc of released artifact and writes it into destFile
        Parameters:
        destFile - must exists.

      • copyDirFromResource

        public static void copyDirFromResource(Class clazz,
                       String dirPath,
                       File destDir)
        Extracts the directory at resource path to target directory. First directory is searched in local "src/main/resources" so the thing also works when developing in the IDE. If not found then searches in jar file.

      • copyDirFromJar

        public static void copyDirFromJar(File file,
                  File destDir,
                  String dirPath)
        Extracts the files starting with dirPath from file to destDir
        Parameters:
        dirPath - the prefix used for filtering. If empty the whole jar content is extracted.

      • findResourceStream

        public static InputStream findResourceStream(String path)
        Searches resource indicated by path first in src/main/resources (so it works even when developing), then in proper classpath resources. If resource is found it is returned as input stream, otherwise an exception is thrown.
        Throws:
        eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.NotFoundException - if path can't be found.

      • targetName

        public static String targetName(String relPath)
        Returns the name displayed on the website as menu item for a given page.
        Parameters:
        relPath - path relative to the #sourceRepoDir (i.e. LICENSE.txt or docs/README.md)
